text: I don't think this is currently possible, also the workflows channel is not the correct channel

Hello All! I am working on setting up a Webhook via Workflows within Django and can't seem to find out why I am receiving Validation issues.
For context, I am simply trying to print out all the info being sent from the HubSpot Workflow.
To give insight into my ViewSet, I am simply using a ViewSet from rest_framework.viewsets and trying to just return "request.body". When I try to do this, I am retrieving this error below when clicking "Test".
Hey Hayden, workflows can't connect to your localhost. You'll need your API to be deployed somewhere on the public internet, or use something like <https://ngrok.com/|ngrok>
Hey Angus, thank you as this is very helpful! Can you confirm why I would be receiving a 500 / not receive the data after removing permissions and authentication for a viewset in Django?
